snippet.title: Hiboka - Pre-Alpha Footage
snippet.description:
Pre-alpha footage of our game Hiboka, a single player survival horror video game based on folklore from Madagascar and set around the middle of the 20th century.


To stay up-to-date, register to our mailing list and visit the game page:
https://mailchi.mp/266ab49583be/fcg

https://flyingcarpetsgames.com/hiboka/
